message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses the challenges of managing vagueness and uncertainty in natural language generation from non-linguistic data, which is a common problem in computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also proposes the use of fuzzy sets to model and manage imprecision in human language, which is a technique commonly used in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the potential applications of fuzzy sets in information retrieval (cs.IR) and data mining (cs.SI) contexts.
